description:
***NOTE: If you do not already have a MythTV DVR setup this app is not for you. If you already have a MythTV system, this app requires installation of 1 script file on a local webserver. If you have previously setup the scripts this update will obsolete previous script versions, and you will need to update to the newer script for this app version to work. *** See homepage for details. 

*** This app if for webOS 1.x phones.  Use the regular WebMyth application for webOS 2.x phones. ***

WebMyth is able to control a MythTV frontend using it's built in telnet control interface. MythTV is an opensource DVR program that runs on Linux. The app is designed to control a frontend over a local WiFi connection, though it may be possible to forward the appropriate port on your router & control the frontend over a cellular network. The app requires installing a very small python script on a local webserver. 

Go to http://code.google.com/p/webmyth/ to download the necessary script.
